resources.string: %1$s doesn\'t support direct apply, you can apply %2$s manually from the launcher settings.
Tap and hold on homescreen - Settings - Icon Pack - choose %s.
%s is not installed. Do you want to open Google Play Store to download and install it?

Micopacks helps managing installed icon packs on the device. Also helps auto applying icon packs using tasker/locale plugin. Support various launchers and icon packs.


Libraries Used:

 RootTools by Stericson 
 libsuperuser by Chainfire 
 material-dialogs by afollestad

Developed by github.com/ukanth
Tasker plugin - Requires ROOT for Nova Launcher
Detected %s, Sorry not supported for tasker yet!
Root requires to apply the change
